basics.name: Your Name
basics.label: Cloud & AI Strategist
basics.summary: Hybrid technologist blending AI-native systems design with regulated cloud infrastructure expertise. Proven leader in FedRAMP, A2A/MCP protocols, and secure architecture at scale.

work.name: Stealth Cloud Startup
work.summary: Led the design and implementation of hybrid AI-native infrastructure supporting edge devices, LLM workflows, and continuous compliance across AWS + on-prem.
highlights: Designed a custom Model Context Protocol (MCP) for secure LLM operations in a FedRAMP High boundary
Orchestrated agentic pipelines integrating LangChain, CrewAI, and event-driven microservices
Created multi-cloud landing zones using Terraform, AWS CDK, and Zero Trust network segmentation

projects.name: Personal Resume Site
projects.description: Single-page application hosted on AWS, showcasing resume, projects, and blog. Built with React, Tailwind, GSAP, and containerized deployment.
highlights: Implements MCP-inspired architecture for dynamic context handling
CI/CD via GitHub Actions with IaC-managed S3 + CloudFront deployment
Scroll-based animations and responsive dark/light mode toggle
